elementValueMap.EvidenceText: Significant bruising was observed on left arm. Discovery photos attached.
elementValueMap.ImmediatePlan: Move Chris into a different class, with a teacher who has more experience with challenging student. Work with DCFS on more extensive follow-up plan.
elementValueMap.PressingIssue: Karen, is concerned about her student Samuel.   Samuel's behavior has changed the last couple of months.  Samuel has been unable to concentrate at school and his grades have been dropping.  Karen has noticed that some of his clothing is soiled, and he confided in her and told her he hasnâ€™t been eating at home. Karen has tried contacting Andrea to have a parent/teacher conference but has gotten no response.  Samuel mentioned his mom had a new boyfriend that stays over at the house from time to time.  Karen spoke to Samuel and noticed a bruise on his arm (purplish color).  Karen is very concerned and decided to report an incident of alleged physical abuse and neglect to the local DFS/CPS office.
elementValueMap.Remarks: Chris mentioned that his mother has a new boyfriend. When the principal asked if Chris likes the new boyfriend, the child broke eye contact and became sullen.
elementValueMap.SubstanceAbuseConcerns: No knowledge of substance abuse with the family
